remain at the forefront of successful automotive research and development MBRDNA is headquartered in Silicon Valley California with key areas of Autonomous Driving Advanced Interaction Design Digital User Experience Machine Learning Customer Research and Open Innovation In Redford Michigan the focus is on Powertrain and eDrive technology as well as in Long Beach where the teams test durability of the latest driver assistant and telematic systems The Digital Hub in Seattle focusses on developing a cloud architecture and building out the cloud platform for the next generation of connected car services The Testing and Regulatory Affairs Division in Ann Arbor and the Advanced Vehicle Design in Carlsbad complete the competence centerltbrgtltbrgtMercedesBenz Seattle Hub is looking for a professional Senior Site Reliability Engineer to grow their career at our new office in Seattle The Cloud Platform Engineering team are the experts that build and maintain the Kubernetesbased platform infrastructure and tooling solutions for our global development teams At MBRDNA we are a geodiverse team of system engineers infrastructure engineers developers Solutions Architects and SMEs with opportunities to develop infrastructure software tools and processes to support our charter and to further the technological capabilities of MercedesBenz worldwideltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob
